snippet.title: Cattle Country - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
If your cozy gaming needs a bit of time spent as a settler, Cattle Country should have you covered. It's a new "cozy cowboy life-sim adventure" from developer Castle Pixel and publisher Playtonic friends for PC (via Steam). You'll do some ranching, getting to know your fellow townsfolk, hunting for treasure, and even discovering romance. You can check out Cattle Country on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2818150/Cattle_Country/ 

#IGN #Gaming
